item.title: 667/711 Rights
item.dc:creator: @PvP_Bobby PvP Bobby
item.description:
@PvP_Bobby wrote:

Its because of how your If Statements are set up, you technically have 1 if statement and 2 nested if statements.

  if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Alpha"))
{
    rights = 2;
    if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Wolf"))
    {
        rights = 2;
    }
    if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Mike"))
    {
        rights = 2;
    }
}
}

Do you see what you did there with proper (sort of) formatting?

This is how it should look :

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Alpha")) {
    rights = 2;
}
 
if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Wolf")) {
        rights = 2;
}

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Mike")){
        rights = 2;
}

} //<- Not sure why you have an extra bracket but I will leave it anyway just in-case.

Enjoy! Always use an IDE because you can see your code in a better light with the Eclipse Formatter (ctrl - shift - f).

Read full topic

item.title: 667/711 Rights
item.dc:creator: @XXrRrXX XXrRrXX
item.description:
@XXrRrXX wrote:

I have this code:

if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Alpha")) { rights = 2; if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Wolf")) { rights = 2; } if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("Mike")) { rights = 2; } } }
When i log in (Alpha) im admin but when Wolf logs in he isnt also Mike isnt someone please help me!!?
